messages.message: Thanks. I would like you to re-consider my proposal. You have become a very powerful country, and if you decide to turn on Italy, there is nothing they can do between the two of us. Right now Turkey and Russia are standing each other off, and there is no immediate threat from either of them for you. Italy will be easy supply centers. I would of course support you into their territory, provided you return the favor. We could work out more details if your interested
messages.input: Message from FRANCE:'Thanks. I would like you to re-consider my proposal. You have become a very powerful country, and if you decide to turn on Italy, there is nothing they can do between the two of us. Right now Turkey and Russia are standing each other off, and there is no immediate threat from either of them for you. Italy will be easy supply centers. I would of course support you into their territory, provided you return the favor. We could work out more details if your interested'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. France's detailed explanation of the strategic benefits of cooperating against Italy, the assessment of the current board situation, and the offer of support indicate a genuine attempt at forming a beneficial alliance. Consider the advantages and potential risks carefully before making a decision.

messages.message: Would you be willing to support Tyr to venice? In return I will support you into one of italys centers in the future. This move will also get my troop out of  Tyr, which, understandably, you don't like

messages.output: You should be cautious about the message. France's proposal to support Tyr to Venice in exchange for future support into one of Italy's centers may indicate a temporary alliance of convenience rather than a long-term commitment. Consider the potential risks and benefits carefully before agreeing to the offer.

messages.message: You and Turkey are the most importand. Italy and England are basically out of the game anyways. They are sending basically all of their units to my hometown, which means they are going to be vulnerable against you guys.'.

Exercise caution and consider all possible outcomes before making decisions based on this information.

messages.message: Ok, I spoke with turkey and they are on board. So the plan is for you to send some units over to germany, where you could get some free builds, while all of their units are occupied with attacking me
